news.title: Over two million homeowners to get letters from Revenue warning them to revalue homes for property tax
news.summary: More than two million homeowners are set to get letters from Revenue soon warning them to revalue their homes for the property tax.

news.title: Race to the Áras: Gareth Sheridan loses out on Carlow County Council nomination as Independent Ireland to meet Maria Steen
news.summary: Follow the latest developments in our live blog:

news.title: Nato confirms it intercepted three Russian fighter jets which violated Estonia’s airspace
news.summary: NATO responded immediately and intercepted the Russian jets which violated Estonian airspace, a NATO spokesperson said in a statement on social media X on Friday.

news.title: Sacked Irish tech boss wins over €440k as Labour Court ups record-breaking dismissal payout
news.summary: The Labour Court has ordered a tech company to pay over half a million US dollars to its Irish founder after the firm failed in its appeal against what it claimed to be an “excessive” unfair dismissal award.

news.title: Online Irish teacher Mollie Guidera: ‘I think Ireland is going to be bilingual in my lifetime’
news.summary: If there was ever somebody who embodies the idea of eating, sleeping and breathing a language, it would be Mollie Guidera. The Irish language teacher, content creator, author, activist and healer lights up from the moment you use your first cúpla focal.

news.title: ‘I was having nightmares for weeks’ – Tina Satchwell’s family speak of the ‘gory’ details revealed during murder trial
news.summary: Tina Satchwell’s half-sister has spoken of the disturbing details revealed during the trial of Richard Satchwell for murder.

news.title: Pensioner admits causing death of paedophile former Ireland rugby player David Tweed
news.summary: A North Antrim pensioner has admitted causing the death of former Ireland rugby international, unionist councillor and convicted paedophile David Tweed.

news.title: ‘We were happy to prioritise time over money’ – can you afford to work a four-day week?
news.summary: On a windswept Friday morning, Mark Kane, CEO of sustainability consultancy Sustainabil-IT, is not at his laptop or in a boardroom.

news.title: ‘I do not want people to think I’m finished’ – Rafa Benitez on why he wants to coach in England again
news.summary: When the two teams walk out at a gleaming Anfield for Saturday’s Merseyside derby – the hosts with their expensively assembled strike-force in tow – there will be one man watching who can proudly reflect on being an architect of the modern Liverpool.

news.title: Kate O’Connor reacts to dream start in World Championships heptathlon medal bid in Tokyo
news.summary: Kate O’Connor is aiming to win a global medal in the multi-events. She has been here before, looking out from such dizzying heights. And after a spectacular first day, she now looks fully capable of doing it.
